jcr:content.awardContent1: Scholarships to American high school students to spend the academic year in countries that may include Bosnia & Herzegovina, Egypt, Ghana, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, Mali (semester), Morocco, Oman, South Africa, Thailand, Tunisia, and Turkey.
jcr:content.awardName1: Kennedy-Lugar Youth Exchange and Study (YES) Abroad Program
jcr:content.awardReq1: U.S. citizen High school student at the time of application Aged 15 - 18 at the start of the program For the following countries, prior French skills are required: Mali, Morocco, and Tunisia.
